mapper.select: SELECT d.*, u.username, u2.nickname AS targetArtistName FROM demand d LEFT JOIN user u ON d.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN artist a ON d.target_artist_id = a.id LEFT JOIN user u2 ON a.user_id = u2.id WHERE d.id = #{id}
SELECT d.*, u.username FROM demand d LEFT JOIN user u ON d.user_id = u.id WHERE d.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY d.create_time DESC
SELECT d.*, u.username FROM demand d LEFT JOIN user u ON d.user_id = u.id ORDER BY d.create_time DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO demand (user_id, title, description, type, size, style, budget_min, budget_max, deadline, ref_images, target_artist_id, status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{type}, #{size}, #{style}, #{budgetMin}, #{budgetMax}, #{deadline}, #{refImages}, #{targetArtistId}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE demand SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, type = #{type}, size = #{size}, style = #{style}, budget_min = #{budgetMin}, budget_max = #{budgetMax}, deadline = #{deadline} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE demand SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
